WorkItem.Description:
I'm trying to plan my priest for level 80, and I started by trying to load from armory my priest. Now my priest has Discerning Eye of the Beast (http://www.wowhead.com/?item=42992), however she is currently only lvl 76. She also has the Dignified Headmaster's Charge (http://www.wowhead.com/?item=42947). The problem it looks like is that RAWR cannot handle the level attribute for BoA items. Because when I try loading my character, I get the error message:
 
Step Name: Get Item
Description: Rawr encountered an error getting Item from Armory: 42992
Input string was not in a correct format.
   at System.Number.StringToNumber(String str, NumberStyles options, NumberBuffer& number, NumberFormatInfo info, Boolean parseDecimal)
   at System.Number.ParseInt32(String s, NumberStyles style, NumberFormatInfo info)
   at Rawr.SpecialEffects.ProcessEquipLine(String line, Stats stats, Boolean isArmory)
   at Rawr.Armory.GetItem(Int32 id, String logReason)
 
I understand that RAWR is designed for lvl 80 toons. But I was curious if, for BoA items, to load from Armory by just getting the item id, and enchant. Have in the item listing the BoA stats only That way the level information doesn't affect the final numbers.

Comments.Message: What version of Rawr is this? Those items add fine for me (using their L80 values) in v2.2.0b5.

version 2.2.0b5

All I can say is to try to load from Armory "Delholy - Deathwing" and see what happens. Like I said she is currently lvl 76, so her stats may not be loading correctly because of that.
Found the problem, was specific to Armory loading (Tools > Edit Items > Add, add the item, then load your character, and it'll work, in the mean time). Fixed for b6.
